sentences.en: She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.cn: 她开始坐起来，痛苦地皱着脸，又虚弱地靠回到枕头上。

sentences.en: Even the most apathetic students are beginning to sit up and listen.
sentences.cn: 即使最漠不关心的学生都开始坐直身子听了。

sentences.en: The patient was but poorly able to sit up.
